newsitem.title: UK: UK grain futures mostly lower in pre-holiday trade.
newsitem.headline: UK grain futures mostly lower in pre-holiday trade.

text.p: UK wheat and barley futures were mostly lower on Friday, but traders said there were no fireworks ahead of the holiday weekend.
The market is now closed until Tuesday August 27.
"The market has run out of steam, it tried to go up, but the rise was sold into. Players are also looking at the French market which is lower," said a trader.
Wheat futures closed around 0.70 to 0.45 stg down after trading 328 lots.
Barley finished 1.30 to 0.25 stg lower on a turnover of 195 lots.
Amsterdam milling wheat futures were neglected.
The Dutch market will be operating normally on Monday.
UK cash market traders reported thin trade with no fob business and only light trading seen on the delivered market.
